body:
# Welcome to ConfigMan a systems configuration manager.

This is a personal project to allow me to experiment with Rails 3.

The aim of Configman is to allow recording of the website urls and the severs they are deployed to. I aim to have automatic reminding of soon to expire urls and SSL certificates and also allow the changes to configuration to be recorded.

Licensed under the MIT License (MIT)

Copyright 2012 RailsGirl42.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Configman
